name: Grilled Shrimp Jalapeno Kabobs
author: MISSERSUE
summary: An awesome mix of flavors that can be whipped up in a hurry. Always get rave reviews when we cook these shrimp kabobs up on the grill.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1  lime, juiced, or more to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate
Place shrimp in a glass bowl
While the shrimp is marinating, slice jalapeno peppers in half and remove seeds
Tuck 1 shrimp into a jalapeno half
Wrap with 1 slice of bacon and thread onto a skewer
Repeat with remaining shrimp, jalapenos, and bacon, adding onion chunks in between every 2 or 3 shrimp
Place skewers on the preheated grill
Cook, flipping every 4 to 5 minutes and basting with lime juice if desired, until shrimp are pink and bacon has browned, 15 to 20 minutes
